mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERFAVORITE_TB (EMAIL, RECENT_FV, DATE_FV, ROOM_EX) VALUES ( #{email}, #{recnetFv}, SYSDATE, 'Y' )
INSERT INTO USERFAVORITE_TB (EMAIL, DIBS_FV, DATE_FV, ROOM_EX) VALUES ( #{email}, #{dibsFv}, SYSDATE, 'Y' )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USERFAVORITE_TB WHERE DIBS_FV=#{dibsFv} AND EMAIL=#{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE USERFAVORITE_TB SET ROOM_EX='N' WHERE RECENT_FV=#{recentFv} AND NOT RECENT_FV IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT DIBS_FV, DATE_FV FROM USERFAVORITE_TB WHERE EMAIL=#{email} AND NOT DIBS_FV IS NULL ORDER BY DATE_FV DESC
SELECT EMAIL, RECENT_FV, DATE_FV, ROOM_EX FROM (SELECT EMAIL, RECENT_FV, DATE_FV, ROOM_EX FROM USERFAVORITE_TB WHERE EMAIL=#{email} ORDER BY DATE_FV DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 30
